const in6_addr & rhs )
inline

Test if two low-level C IPv6 addresses are different.

Parameters
lhsAn IPv6 address
rhsAn IPv6 address
Returns
true if the addresses are different, false if they match.

◆ operator<<()

std::ostream & sockpp::operator<< ( std::ostream & os,
const inet6_address & addr )

Stream inserter for the address.

This uses the simple dot notation of the address as returned from inet_ntop(). It does not attempt a host lookup.

Parameters
osThe output stream
addrThe address
Returns
A reference to the output stream.
